name: Flippy Sneakers!
description:
Have you ever seen flippy sneakers landing on hills like in bottle flip challenge? Get ready to take part in bottle flip challenge, but instead of bottle, you will have sneakers. Throw flippy sneakers on the nearby hills or boat and make them land on their sole. Throw flippy sneakers and move forward. Your way is consisted of hills and boats and your only target here is to flip sneakers and land them on their sole. This simulator is much more awesome than bottle flip challenge. So flip sneakers and earn points and tokens in our new simulator: Flippy Sneakers.

In this simulator, your main target is throwing flippy sneakers to hills or boats and landing those sneakers on their sole. For landing sneakers on sole, you will earn points. Collect as many points as you can to become the best in the leaderboard. Also, you can find come coins on your way, collect them to buy new, more awesome flippy sneakers. Prove everyone that this is the easiest task for you to throw flippy sneakers to hills and boat and land those sneakers on their sole. Time of bottle flip challenge has passed, so become the best in throwing flippy sneakers and become the leader of the scoreboard in our new simulator.

Flippy Sneakers is a free to play simulator of throwing sneakers to hills and boats. Land those flippy sneakers on their sole and earn points. Prove everyone that you deserve being on the top of the leaderboard. Earn tokens while you are throwing flippy sneakers and buy yourself new outfit for your sneakers with awesome effects. Call your friends and compete with them in throwing sneakers to hills and boats. Show them that you can easily land your flippy sneakers on sole. Become the best in our simulator and reach the top of the leaderboard. Download our application and start throwing flippy sneakers to hills and boats. Show everyone perfect landing of sneakers on sole!
